query: What is the status of SZA's merchandise, including information about sizing issues at concerts and when merchandise will be shipped, if known?
answer: There have been reports of sizing issues with SZA's merchandise at concerts. For instance, a fan in San Francisco purchased a medium shirt but was given a large instead, and the staff were unable to rectify the issue. Additionally, some merchandise, such as the SZA ladybug shirt and hoodie, were only being sold outside the stadium. As for merchandise shipping, there has been no update beyond the initial announcement that it would ship in Spring 2025.

supporting_contexts.text:
Watch SZA surprise fans by bringing out Justin Bieber for ‘Snooze’ on ‘Grand National Tour’ stop in Los Angeles

2025-05-24 10:27:11+00:00

Merch Madness at Kendrick x SZA: Wrong Size, No Fix, and “Try Bribing Someone”?

I went to the Kendrick/SZA show tonight in San Francisco and ended up having one of the worst merch experiences I've ever had. I bought a medium shirt knowing they fit oversized and specifically wanted a medium, but when the worker handed me my shirt, she gave me a large. I didn't check right away, just walked about 10 feet away and then noticed the size was wrong. I went back to let them know they gave me the wrong size, and they said there's nothing they can do. Nothing. I spent $55 on a shirt, was handed the wrong size by an employee, and now I'm stuck with it? Their solution was to "just shrink it in the dryer or something." What!? They wouldn't even let me go to another booth that had my correct size...


On top of that, the SZA ladybug shirt and hoodie were only being sold outside the stadium. That line was insane (because people without tickets were also there)


I figured there'd be merch inside too (and there was), but none of the inside booths had that. And of course, once you're inside, there's no re entry. I explained all of this to both a merch worker and a stadium staff member, and still no exceptions. What made it worse? A worker literally told a group I was with that if we bribe one of the merch employees, they might go outside and get it for us since they can leave and come back in.
What is going on with the merch team? Between the wrong size issue, zero accountability, and now being told bribery is the workaround... it's a mess.

Sza symbolism

Hi there! So I’m wanting to go to the grand national tour but I’m wanting to crochet myself a fit. I’m more of a Kendrick fan so I was going to make a sweater but since the concert is both of them I still want to incorporate sza in a way. I love her music but I honestly don’t know much about her besides her catchy songs. I was wondering if anybody could help me point in the right direction of the types of objects that could clearly represent her. I believe her theme for the tour is like bugs? So I was thinking maybe making a top where the front is a butterfly and the back will say her name? But I guess I don’t know if a butterfly would be the right bug to use if any of those makes sense lol. Any help/object/catch phrases, etc would be appreciated!
Oh also any colors that fits her vibe as well! I have this purple/white yarn I was thinking of using but again idk if purple is her vibe

Sza Merch Shipping???

Does anyone know when the merch is gonna be shipped?? It says Spring 2025 but there’s been no updates whatsoever I’m getting nervous that I wasted my money😣😣
